title: Distribution and trophodynamics of substituted diphenylamine antioxidants and benzotriazole UV stabilizers in a freshwater ecosystem and the adjacent riparian environment
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, 26,1031-1041
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00193A, Paper
Zhe Lu, Amila O. De Silva, Christine Spencer, Gerald R. Tetreault, Shane R. de Solla, Derek C. G. Muir
The trophodynamics of substituted diphenylamine antioxidants and benzotriazole UV stabilizers vary depending on whether the food web is terrestrial or aquatic.
